name: MS Paint DOOM
description:
MS PAINT DOOM

MS Paint Doom is a kind of remake of the original doom from 1993 but all of the design is made in ms paint, and all the sounds are loud cuz xd

It works on windows and might work for other pcs aswell but i have no way of testing the game on other pcs

The game lasts about 15-30 mins (depends on your skill)

Enjoy this hellhole

Controls

wasd to move ofc

Space to open doors

Mouse or arrows to turn and ctrl to shoot

Escape for menu.

Mouse scroll to switch weapons

Discord server: https://discord.gg/HtHqX5FyB3
